title: Pomegranate Salsa
directions: Mix pomegranate seeds, mandarin oranges, onion, fresh jalapeno, pickled jalapeno, cilantro, lime juice, and cumin together in a bowl.
Cover bowl and refrigerate for several hours or overnight to let flavors blend.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) cans mandarin orange segments, drained and coarsely chopped
